title: Manage Carrier On-Time Performance
description: A carrier manager needs to review the on-time pickup and delivery performance for a specific carrier over the last quarter.

tasks.description: Generate a performance report for the selected carrier for the previous quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the carrier scorecard report.

tasks.description: Analyze the report to identify the on-time pickup and on-time delivery percentages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the carrier's on-time delivery is 85%, which is below the 95% target.

tasks.description: Draft an email to the carrier representative with the performance data to request a corrective action plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a data-driven communication to the carrier to address the performance issue.
